I'm Douglas meny I'm the Chief
Information officer for the shoeer group
since we're inside of the healthcare
Arena a lot of what we're working on
today is working with AWS and
integration Partners on the security of
data inside of the AWS environment we
deal a lot with patient health
information and protecting that under
compliance rules with hippoc compliance
as well as PCI compliance and as we're
migrating the patient health information
we're ensuring that we've got it in a
fully encrypted environment and that
we've crossed all of our te's and dotted
our eyes from a hippoc compliance
perspective the term Cloud scares a lot
of people as we look at protecting that
patient Privacy Information we're really
cautious about ensuring that we're able
to not only encrypt data at rest but
also be able to encrypt data while it's
in transit and give the proper controls
in place for only the individuals that
need to have access to that data to be
able to see that
[Music]
data
